channel.title: The ONLY duping that taken place
channel.description:
Ok allot of you saying duping was back, but no neverm my friend jut and sixfeetunder wer the ones who found it out, heres the FULL story with EVERYTHING they duped.
Heres what xx jut xx says...
2003 November 7 was a historical moment for RuneScape. Jagex catched a lot of players, who were cheating - cheaters created a lot of new items, including party hats and crackers.
The Down-Low About Duping by Iost Iunatic (SixFeetUnder)
[img]http://games.infoseka.lt/duping1.jpg[/img]
Here it goes... I was the person who discovered the dupe and used it, and told like 3 other people, and then it got leaked. If it hadn't gotten leaked, I would be rich and the economy wouldn't suck, and Jagex wouldn't be uber pissed at me. This shall be a historical acount of the third time of duping. Before you begin to read this, please know this had no intentions of hurting the economy, or Jagex in any way shape or form. As for me, I have been banned on every character I own (including ones that did not use the dupe and we're banned out of error. Jagex wouldn't listen to my appeal though). Because of this, I am also quitting RuneScape now. But hey, at least im going out with a major bang. Now, onto the fun/interesting stuff.
[img]http://games.infoseka.lt/duping2.jpg[/img]
The way the dupe worked was when in a trade screen it would put up a non-stackable item with an amount of zero, where it would normally be one. This would trick my side into thinking I put up nothing, and the other into thinking I put up one. So really, it's not duping because you don't need one to start with. It's more like "Creation." It also used an item ID. An item id is the number given to an item. No, each item does not have it's own ID. All r2h's are item 81, and all pink hats are item 580. This is why it is extremely hard for Jagex to find out which hats are real and which are fake. Here are some other numbers of items:
580 - Pink Hat 579 - Green Hat 581 - White Hat 576 - Red Hat 578 - Blue Hat 577 - Yellow 1278 - Dragon Square 795 - Dragon Med 575 - Cracker 81 - Rune Two Hander
[img]http://games.infoseka.lt/duping3.jpg[/img]
And the next morning. Note that this was my main, who I had NOT logged into at any time during the whole duping dealy so he wouldn't get banned for bug abuse. Well guess what, he was banned.
This is the total TRUTH if you chose not to belive dont post, cuss i dont give a flying fuck :)

item.title: The ONLY duping that taken place
item.dc:creator: @wall_of_fir_the_2nd wall of fir the 2nd
item.description:
@wall_of_fir_the_2nd wrote:

That was copied from Pwnd’s post about the duper, and he posted EVERYTHING you posted.SO WHY BOTHER ACTING SMART WHEN EVERYONE WILL SEE THIS,KNOW YOU’RE A BIG LEECHER AND LAUGH AT YOU?

Read full topic

item.title: The ONLY duping that taken place
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I just started runescape during that time, and I wasn;t aware of any of it. Soon after that I quit rsc, started playing againr ight before rs2 came out. Then I switched to rs2 and it sucked so I didnt start playing until 2004.
[/my life story]

I was too young back then to understand anything that would have happened. I’d have been like 10-11 years old.

item.title: The ONLY duping that taken place
item.dc:creator: @daiki daiki
item.description:
@daiki wrote:

This was more of an “item spawn” and not a dupe, since the spawners had no real party hats to start with. They just spawned those out of nothing.

If the server rolls back your save and not someone you have traded with, you can dupe items. This is very rare.

Read full topic
